name: 華人英文名著選讀
description: This course aims at introducing literature written by Chinese heritage writers and master pieces in Chinese literature translated into English.  Appreciation and analysis of the original pieces will be conducted, and comparison of the translations will be emphasized in class to further analyzed its influences.
goals: Appreciation of Chinese literature and its translation
Comparison of Chinese cultures and others.
Development of the ability for teamwork and communication.
syllabus:
一、教學目標：課程內容包括英譯中國古典文學以及中國現代文學。目標主要在於文學的英文知識的獲取與運用。藉由文本之閱讀，嘗試對作家之書寫內容，作深入之探討與理解。本課程以英文進行。
